title: CBC Life
text:
The witch is the most popular Halloween costume in America for 2017 and we Northern trick or treaters love our classic creatures as well. We even coined the term "Trick or Treat". But even if you love the holiday and wear Halloween gear all year, actual party costume prep can really creep up on you.

So we asked makeup artist Julia Dantas to create a simple makeup look that packs high drama and IS your costume. The results are scary good. Her latest makeup tutorial lets you transform into a witch, a vampire or a mummy in a few simple steps and with minimum additional hair and outfit styling. Check out the video below for the full demo.

Frighteningly good looks by makeup artist Julia Dantas 3:17

Julia used the following products in this tutorial:

Mac Face & Body Foundation

Pur Cosmetics "Bare It All" Foundation

Mac Cosmetics "Pro Long-Wear" Concealer

RCMA Setting Powder

Makeup Forever Bronzer/Contour

Pur Cosmetics Pur Pro x Etienne Palette

Dodo Lashes #309

Colourpop "Creeper" Liquid Lipstick

Pur Cosmetics "On Point" Black Gel Liner

Be sure to also check out Julia's crown eyes tutorial for all your regal looks as well as the only mermaid makeup tutorial you'll ever need.
description: Frighteningly good looks by makeup artist Julia Dantas
